short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to focus on the bolded part of the word for your brain to read faster than your eyes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bionic Reading was created by a Swiss developer named Renato Casuut .His aim was to make reading easier by "guiding the eyes through artificial fixation points."

The idea is your eyes focus on the bolded part of the word and your brain completes the rest. Your brain can read faster than your eyes, so by essentially reducing the number of letters your eye needs to look at, you can read faster while still retaining the full context.

This Extension does just that, by transforming whatever text you're reading into bionic format. You can adjust the font weight, font size, and the colour of the word that are highlighted as well!
